title: When I Get Bigger
description:
When Little Critter gets older, what exciting adventures will he have?Little Critter imagines all of the exciting things he'll do when he gets bigger. Going to the store, staying up late, having a job and much more! What will your child envision when they get bigger?
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites for generations of readers, both young and old!
author: Mercer Mayer
